admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
trustfund:
TF030435-NETHERLANDS (MDC) CONSULTANT
            TRUST FUND - FY04 - IDA ELIGIBLE COUNTRIES,TF038643-ARMENIA:  TITLE REGISTRATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The ratings convey a highly satisfactory
            project outcome, highly likely sustainability, and high
            institutional development impacts, achieved through
            satisfactory performances by both the Bank and Borrower. In
            light of these impressive ratings, lessons specifically
            favor implementing projects through a single agency with
            very strong leadership, learning from similar efforts in
            other countries, and, benefiting from constructive
            criticism. This last comment stems from the issue that
            initial poor service quality, and staff corruption were not
            easily accepted, but persuasion of the veracity of facts
            fostered decisive remedial action, which, in the end, having
            dealt with these problems proved successful. Automation is
            not necessarily a precondition for providing effective
            services, since the move to an aggressive client-friendly
            service proved essential in increasing system efficiency,
            and user acceptance, more so than the transition to a fully
            computerized environment. Most importantly, effective and
            equitable property tax administration, can only be attained
            through a systematic cadastre that effectively captures
            inclusion in the property tax base, and eliminates
            widespread tax evasion. In addition, by proactively
            involving the private sector through competitive
            contracting, and surveying work, substantial efficiency
            gains and cost savings were generated. Lessons also note
            that property valuation can be undertaken within the
            titling, and registration institution, provided the latter
            is not the property-tax collecting agency as well.
